The RTSP port for Frigate.</br>
Internal port: 8554

subquestions.label: WebRTC Port
subquestions.description:
The WebRTC port for Frigate.</br>
Internal port: 8555</br>
Applies to both TCP and UDP.

1.1.17.readme:
Frigate

Frigate is an NVR With Realtime Object Detection for IP Cameras

Note: Coral m.2 TPU devices is not supported.
